newsitem.title: UK: Banks launch National Bank of Romania credit.
newsitem.headline: Banks launch National Bank of Romania credit.

text.p: LONDON, Aug 23 (LPC) - ABN AMRO Bank and Citibank said they launched a $175 million syndicated loan for National Bank of Romania.
The deal has a three-year final maturity and is priced 187.5 bps over LIBOR. Lenders have the option to call the loan at the end of the second year, according to the arrangers.

Commitments of between $2.5 million and $10 million are being sought, with a top upfront fee of 40 bps offered. Banks coming in at $10 million will be designated co-arrangers. The credit is expected to close on September 16.
Romania has a BB minus rating from Standard & Poor's.
